definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: hollow out (cf. As. imbubu, flute, Dl:HWB 443, NH [[אַבּוּב]] id., Aram. 0abuwbo0 [[אַבּוּבָא]] id.; hence also Ar. 0’anbuwbun knots in reed, part of reed between knots, reed; vid. Hoffm:LCB 1882, 321 Frä:23 Fl in Levy:TW i. 417);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pass. [[נׇבוּב]] Job 11:12, Je 52:21; [[נְבוּב]] Ex 27:8, Ex 38:7; —hollowed, hollow: of altar of tabern. [[נְבוּב לֻחוֹת]] Ex 27:8, Ex 38:7 (P); of pillar in temple Je 52:21; fig. [[אִישׁ נׇבוּב]] Job 11:12, i.e. empty, hollow-minded man.
